message.content:
1. A study was conducted.
2. The study investigated the effectiveness of Arnebia euchroma (AE) ointment.
3. The effectiveness of the AE ointment was tested on abdominal fat thickness.

messages.content:
Statement: In this study, we investigated the effectiveness of Arnebia euchroma (AE) ointment on the abdominal fat thickness.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
